name: The Banquet: An Empire Rebuilt
description:
Team-based deathmatch arena. Coordinate attacks with your team to defeat everyone on the opposing team! Maximize damage by weaving 2 oGCD skills in between every GCD

Features
  • 3 classes: Cataphract, Engineer, and Warden
    • Cataphract is a melee class who primarily deals damage and coordinates the team
    • Engineer is a ranged class who primarily sabotages the enemy team with crowd control
    • Warden is a melee class who primarily protects their teammates - reducing the damage they receive and reducing the damage enemies deal
  • Controls
    • ~ (tilde) for targeting the closest enemy
    • 1234567890QE for the bottom skill bar. +SHIFT for the top skill bar. Customizable in the options menu
    • Rough gamepad support. L2 and R2 modifiers are equivalent to CTRL and SHIFT for keyboard
On the Horizon
  • Adding 1 more class: the Priest
    • Priest is a ranged class who primarily keeps their team alive with recovery spells
  • Skill bar lock
  • Saving swapped around skills on the skill bars
  • Better tooltips (e.g. "Increase damage taken by 25%" instead of "Reduce damage taken by -25%")
  • Objectives that are more than team deathmatch
